## Maria Dougherty

#### Senior Associate

Maria Tova Enriquez Dougherty joined HDAdvisors in June 2022 as a Senior Associate. Maria holds a Master’s degree in Urban and Regional Planning from Virginia Commonwealth University, where she specialized in community-engaged urban design and sustainability planning, as well as a Joint Bachelor's from The College of William and Mary and the University of St Andrews. 

She is involved on a variety projects for the company, including providing policy research and programmatic development for HousingForward Virginia and the Virginia Statewide Community Land Trust (VSCLT) and affordable housing real estate development.
